item.description:
SAT OCT 29 –Cabaret Dinner Theatre with Tony Winner HAIRSPRAY and the Connecticut Theatre Group *ADVANCE TICKET DISCOUNT *

Nominated for 12 and winner of 8 Tony Awards, including Best Musical. This big fat hit kicks off our main stage 2011/12 season. Hairspray is as inspiring as it is just plain fun! Full of bouncy songs that will make both children of the 1960s and those born too late wish they could go back in time!

Jump back to 1960s Baltimore, where pleasantly plump Tracy Turnblad has big hair, an even bigger heart, and a huge dream to be a dancer on the Corny Collins Show. The story manages to be a riotous comedy that delivers an important message at the same time.

"Hairspray is a breathless, unstoppable surge of energy!"

--Chicago Sun-Times

Join The Connecticut Theatre Group for Cabaret Style Dinner Theatre

Bring Your Food- or Purchase Food At The Show

THIS EVENT WILL SELL OUT - GET YOUR TICKET NOW

Seating starts at 7pm - Show starts at 8pm

Advance Tickets are $25 * Tickets are $30 at the event

Bridgeport Theatre Company
263 Golden Hill Street
Bridgeport, CT 06604

at Downtown Cabaret Theatre

WE HAVE A VERY LIMITED NUMBER OF TICKETS IN THE CONNECTICUT THEATRE GROUP SECTION

Visit www.CTTheatre.org or call (860) 987-7888


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Join the EntertainmentCT.com UPCOMING EVENTS Email Newsletter at http://www.EntertainmentCT.com/Email-Newsletter.htm
